name: Various types of riceballs - large(adults or teens) or small(toddlers).
desc: Vegan or various flavored meat fillings of asian flavors.  2 hr class in Buitenveldert. Minimum 4 participants.

name: Chicken or Pork Ramen Cooking class
desc: 3 hr class in Buitenveldert. Minimum 4 participants.

name: Kimchi Making class
desc: 3 hr class in Buitenveldert.  Minimum 8 participants.

name: Single Riceball (Large) Lunch
desc: One cup of cooked japanese short-grained rice, deep-fried chicken or pork katsu, cucumbers, pickled daikon, with fruit companions

name: Single toddler riceball lunch
desc: Smaller riceballs for toddlers, with fruit and veggie companions

name: Riceball Tee
desc: Do you love rice and much as we do?!? Celebrate with a tee!

name: Riceball Tote
desc: Do you love rice and much as we do?!? Shout it out loud with a tote!
